topic.title: Configure the Operating System for Updates
topic.shortdesc: Configure the operating system definition with the parameters for registering the provisioned host for updates.

body.p: The hammer os set-parameter command is used to set the parameters. The following parameters are set.

row.entry: Specifies that the hosts will register with Subscription Manager. (true or false)
The username of the Subscription Manager account to register to.
The password for the Subscription Manager account.

ol.li:
Define the OS_ID variable to the ID of the operating system then execute the remaining commands.
Make sure to specify the appropriate username, password, and pool ID by replacing the CHANGEMEs and POOL_ID.

body.codeblock:
# OS_ID=2
# hammer os set-parameter --operatingsystem-id ${OS_ID} \ --name subscription_manager --value true
# hammer os set-parameter --operatingsystem-id ${OS_ID} \ --name subscription_manager_username --value CHANGEME
# hammer os set-parameter --operatingsystem-id ${OS_ID} \ --name subscription_manager_password --value 'CHANGEME'
